code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Note(_ref){let{note,onDelete,onEdit,changeColor}=_ref;const[isEdit,setIsEdit]=useState(false);const[title,setTitle]=useState(note.title);const[content,setContent]=useState(note.content);const handleSave=()=>{onEdit(note.id,{title,content});setIsEdit(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card mb-3",style:{backgroundColor:note.backgroundColor},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-body",children:isEdit?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control mb-2",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"form-control mb-2",value:content,onChange:e=>setContent(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary me-2",onClick:handleSave,children:"Save"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-secondary",onClick:()=>setIsEdit(false),children:"Cancel"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:note.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:note.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger me-2",onClick:()=>onDelete(note.id),children:"Delete"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-secondary me-2",onClick:()=>setIsEdit(true),children:"Edit"})]})})});}export default Note;
